snippet.title: XERA: Survival | Out Now! | Free To Play on Steam
snippet.description:
Action-focused, open world survival shooter, PvPvE against fellow mercenaries and lethal XOIDS. Raid for resources alone or with team-mates, build and defend your base, stash your gear and survive against the odds. You are the hunters. You are the hunted. And the robots never sleep…

Download now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/625340/XERA_Survival/

Website: http://xeragame.com
Forums: https://forums.xeragame.com
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/PlayXERA
Discord: https://discord.gg/xera
Twitter: https://twitter.com/PlayXera
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/PlayXERA
